name: Roguelike Dungeon Generator
description:
This is a dungeon generator prototype for a rogue-like. Numpad keys to move around. Ctrl-Shift-D to enter debug mode; in debug mode press to generate a new dungeon with any seed.

The algorithm is based on pseudocode from RogueBasin.

This is one of my weekly games. See the rest here, and read the write-up of this one here.
